title: Geomagic Foundation 2014 x64
description:
As always this isn't my work, I just found it. This is a MAGNiTUDE release. Tested on windows x64 versions of 8, 8.1, and 10. 

In addition to its precise 3D data processing functions Geomagic Studio incorporates incredible automated tools, all of which enable users to produce the highest quality models in significantly less time and reduce costly man-hours.

GeomagicÃ‚Â® ControlÃ¢â€žÂ¢
Geomagic Control (formerly known as Geomagic QualifyÃ‚Â®) is the industryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most comprehensive, robust and accurate 3D metrology solution and automation platform.

Geomagic Control delivers the highest accuracy, speed and comprehensive, automated reporting on the quality of as-built parts for first-article inspection, production inspection, and supplier management using CMM and laser scanning tools. The software delivers CAD importer tools and airfoil analysis at no charge to help manufacturers rapidly increase product and manufacturing quality, identify process issues and build productivity. Advanced GD&T, probing and dimensional inspection functions enable fast and precise measurement of parts, and Geomagic Control includes intelligent creation of reports in 3D PDF.

The Geomagic Control Automation Platform delivers the power to streamline almost every process, reduce human interaction in measurements and recording, decrease measuring time, and markedly enhance R&R results. Geomagic Control customers can dramatically cut production line downtime, increase accuracy and improve part quality during and after manufacturing.

Geomagic WrapÃ‚Â®
Geomagic Wrap delivers the industryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most powerful toolbox to transform 3D scan data and imported files into 3D models for immediate use downstream. From engineering to entertainment, art to archeology and manufacturing to museums, people from every walk of life are effortlessly reverse engineering perfect 3D models from scan data and 3D files using Geomagic Wrap.

Revolutionize Your 3D Workflows
Geomagic Wrap delivers the most easy-to-use, affordable, fast, accurate path from point clouds to 3D polygonal and surface models that can be used instantly in downstream engineering, manufacturing, engineering, art, industrial design and more. As part of your 3D digital thread, Geomagic Wrap provides the digital bridge to allow you to create perfect data to use directly in 3D printing, milling, archiving and multiple other 3D uses.

With GeomagicÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s advanced Exact Surfacing tools included Geomagic Wrap delivers power yet ease-of-use in cutting-edge modeling functions for that flawless 3D model. Scripting and macros available also automate functions for repetitive tasks during the reverse engineering process.

Geomagic Wrap enables users to transform point cloud data, probe data and imported 3D formats (STL, OBJ, etc.) into 3D polygon meshes for use in manufacturing, analysis, design, entertainment, archeology and analysis.


Prerequisites
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Hardware: The minimum hardware requirements are listed below. More memory will allow for larger models to be processed. 
o	Processor: 2-GHz 
o	Windows 7 32-bit and 64 bit:  8 GB RAM 
o	Windows XP 32-bit:  2 GB RAM
o	Graphics Card:  a video display capable of at least 32-bit color and a CAD-grade graphics card. 
o	For more details, view the following webpage.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Operating System: Supported operating systems are listed below.
o	Windows XP  32-bit:  Service Pack 3 or better
o	For Windows 7 64-bit and 32-bit: Service Pack 1 or better
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢	Third-Party Application: Microsoft Office 2010 (for ControlÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s reporting mechanism), Microsoft .NET Framework 4
